description.value: Profile of the no-basis-Patient profile resource. Used in the Norwegian Personal Connected Health project to document Patient information.

definition.value:
VKP expects a Norwegian "fødselsnummer" as the primary patient identification.
An identifier for this patient. Should be at Fødselsnummer, Felles hjelpenummer or D-nummer.

VKP can use both coded and text value for relationship. Coded values are given according to HL7 CodeSystem http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0131 Text values can be free text description of the relationship. Both a textdescription and a coded value can be present. The main contact of the patient should be coded as "C" - "Emergency Contact"
The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

short.value: Plain text representation of the relationship

definition.value: Plain text representation of the relationship

VKP expects the HER id of the "tjeneste" responsible for providing the patient with "fastlege" services.
Patient's nominated care provider.
